mapper.insert: insert into HE_OwnerBoard values( HE_OwnerBoard_seq.nextVal, #{member_no}, #{finddogboard_no}, 'ING', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select member_no from HE_OwnerBoard where finddogboard_no = #{finddogboard_no}
mapper.update: update HE_OwnerBoard set status = 'Y' where member_no = #{member_no} and finddogboard_no = #{finddogboard_no}
mapper.select: select * from HE_OwnerBoard where finddogboard_no = #{finddogboard_no} and status = 'Y' ORDER BY ownerboard_no
